name: User Verification with Full User Privacy
author: Trusted Accounts

sections.description:
With Trusted Accounts, you can protect your community from bots, trolls, spam and abuse. With an award-winning solution from a purpose company.

This is the official WordPress plugin of Trusted Accounts.

  • Users prove they are real and unique humans.

  • Stop users from creating multiple fake accounts.

  • Protect user privacy to maximize your verification rate.

  • Moderate comments and your community effectively and build a more human community.

Trusted Accounts Features

  • Human Verification (get trustworthy users, prevent fake accounts)
  • Login with Trusted (user friendly and privacy preserving SSO solution)
  • Verification badges

  • Block/unblock verified humans

  • Custom Branding (set your colors and logo for the verification process)

  • Setup Wizard for easy install
  • Compatible with most plugins and themes

About Trusted Accounts

We are in it for a more peaceful web. Bringing our society back together. Trusted Accounts is a purpose company.

Learn more

Support

Can you set this up for me on my current website?

Yes, absolutely. We are happy to help any platforms to become part of a more humane web. Just contact us.

Requirements

  • WordPress since 5.0 or higher
  • PHP >= 7.2

Frequently Asked Questions ( FAQ’s )

Read or FAQ’s on our official website: Go to FAQ.
For support or troubleshooting help please email us at contact@trustedaccounts.org.
sections.installation: To install Trusted Accounts Plugin you need at least WordPress 5.0 and PHP 7.2
